reportMeta.title: Annual Technical Symposium 2025
reportMeta.department: Department of Computer Science and Engineering

overview.objective: To provide students with a platform to exhibit technical skills and creativity through project presentations, hackathons, and workshops.
overview.summary: The Annual Technical Symposium 2025 witnessed participation from over 300 students across 5 branches. The event included coding contests, AI project showcases, and expert lectures from industry professionals.

activities.title: AI Innovation Challenge
activities.description: Teams built AI models addressing real-world problems. The top 3 teams were awarded certificates and prizes.

activities.title: Coding Marathon
activities.description: A 6-hour coding contest promoting efficient algorithms and creative problem solving.

activities.title: Tech Expo
activities.description: Students exhibited hardware and IoT-based innovations to industry visitors.

remarks.principalRemark: An inspiring display of innovation and teamwork by the students. Encourages continued interdisciplinary engagement.
remarks.closingNote: Certificates were distributed to winners and volunteers. The event concluded with a vote of thanks.
